text: Four ships of the Royal Navy have borne the name HMS Furnace: * was a 4-gun bomb vessel launched in 1695 and broken up in 1725. * was a 14-gun bomb vessel launched in 1740 and sold in 1763. * was an 8-gun fireship launched in 1779 and sold in 1783. * was a 12-gun gunvessel launched in 1797 and sold in 1802. Category:Royal Navy ship names
title: HMS Furnace
